etymology.description: Semantic: 氵(氵) (shuǐ, "water") + Phonetic: 原(原) (yuán, "origin") = water source or origin -> origin; source; fountainhead
etymology.interpretation: The character 源(yuán) uses 氵(氵) to indicate its association with water, symbolizing the beginning or source of a river. The phonetic component 原(原) also means 'origin,' reinforcing the meaning of a point where something begins.

examples.chinese: 知识的积累是灵感的源(知識的積累是靈感的源)，推动了创新的发展(推動了創新的發展)。
examples.pinyin: Zhīshì de jīlěi shì línggǎn de yuán, tuīdòng le chuàngxīn de fāzhǎn.
examples.english: The accumulation of knowledge is the source of inspiration, which propels the development of innovation.

examples.chinese: 他的成功源于不懈努力(他的成功源於不懈努力)。
examples.pinyin: Tā de chénggōng yuányú bùxiè nǔlì.
examples.english: His success originates from relentless effort.
